Reference

All functions

alignmentMatrix()

aligned topics across chains

betaAligned()

Align ASVs proportions in topics across chain.

diagnosticsPlot()

Diagnostics plots - ESS and Rhat.

diffTop()

Differential topic analysis

modelAssessment()

Model assessement for LDA

phyloseqTransformation()

Anscombe (1948) transformation

plotASVCircular()

Plot the ASVs distribution in each topic.

plotTopicProportion()

Plot the topic distribution in all specimens.

setUpData()

Set-up data for latent Dirichlet allocation

thetaAligned()

Align topic proportions in specimens across chain.
